title: What would happen if SKT wins worlds? Do you make more SKT skins?
body: I just was thinking about this so...yea

replies.body:
I think they should "Make skins with same style for new set of champions." Especially because the meta has changed and I don't think people use Zyra anymore in the LCS ( I could be wrong since I only watch NA and haven't seen a Zyra this season). 

They would probably give them to different champions depending on who they play like: 
Top: Hecraim, Gnar, Riven, Wukong, Irelia
Jungle: Sejuani, Amumu, Nautilus, Rek'Sai, Nidalee, Nunu (Even though he has TPA).
Mid: Cho' Gath, Annie, Morgana, Diana, Urgot
ADC: Jinx, Sivir, Kalista, Kog'Maw, Corki (Even though he has Fnatic)
Support:  Janna, Leona, Braum, Nautilus, Thresh (Even though he has SSW) 

I know most of these champions are used a lot so unless SKT wants to use the same comp as they used in season 3 lol.
inb4 rerelease of existing SKT T1 skins with "2015" on loading screen art :p

I was wondering this too actually. They have two options:
1. Make skins with same style for new set of champions
2. Don't make new skins at all.

There was this poll that Riot had going around to random players asking what they thought about all the Team based stuff in the game, so Riot maybe concerned that things like team icon, skins, and wards are cluttering the game and aren't worth putting in. Not sure though.

"Make skins with same style for new set of champions"
Actually, I think they would make a new set of skins with a different style.  Though the SKT color scheme would of course be present.
Color/Styles/Theme It's all the same to me lol.
should just make all the skt skins ult skins
New champ gets made as the SKT mascot. It's base skin is the SKT skin, and it's alt skin is the SGW skin theme but all beat up and homeless bc their team moved away.
What if they win with the same champs as before?

How about instead of 750 skins there would be a bump in quality like 
Win worlds-750 skins
Win worlds twice-975 skins
3 times-1350
4 times-1820
5 times-3250
6 times free
